DOC.detailed_description: High breast density age strong risk factor sporadic breast cancer among woman . Although glandular epithelium contributes mammographic density , non-epithelial tissue component represent major determinant : adipose tissue radiolucent fibrous tissue dense . The hypothesis epidemiologic factor associate elevate breast density alter breast microenvironment ( ME ) ( defined cell structure surround luminal glandular cell include : myoepithelial cell ; basement membrane , stromal fibroblast myofibroblasts ; endothelial cell pericytes ; inflammatory cell , collagen , matrix protein , growth factor , hormone , biochemical component ) manner enhances dysregulated proliferation breast epithelium ultimately cancer . The critical importance ME carcinogenesis support experimental clinical data show epithelial abnormality alone generally insufficient cancer development without concurrent change ME . They enroll 250 woman age 40 65 year undergo radiologically guide biopsy University Vermont , large center within Vermont Breast Cancer Surveillance System ( VBCSS ) , participate pilot study mammographic density .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Inclusion criterion participation study woman , age 4065 year age , undergo radiologicallyguided biopsy ( stereotactic ultrasoundguided ) . We NOT exclude subject current past use exogenous hormone ; prior hysterectomy salpingoophorectomy presentation breast mass . Although biopsy prompt radiologic finding ( typically abnormal calcification mass ) , biopsy perform symptom unassociated radiologic finding , nipple discharge , palpable mass , discomfort , etc .
